about_the_game:
What is Toxic Toads?

Toxic Toads is a 2d platformer to play alone or with friends, where you have to jump a lot and consider your every move! 

What's the fun of it?

Each toad is so toxic that it leaves a brightly colored slime behind that is deadly to the touch! 

Story mode

Play alone (if you’re forever alone) or invite your friends, some levels support up to 4 players! 

Complete 50 exciting puzzles in different locations: Lab, forest, cave!

Bring all the toads to the exit! 

Party mode

  • Multiplayer: up to 4 players! Network and local!

  • Base: Pass levels together, work together to win! 

  • Race: Try your best to be the fastest! All players start from the same point, but who finishes first? (Reduced Toxicity Mode)

  • Workshop: Access levels that are created by the community, plenty of options for you and your friends! 

    ...and much more! 

  • Level Editor: Design unique levels and race tracks, upload them to steam workshop, play by yourself and with your friends! 

  • Full support for all controllers

  • Amusing for everyone who loves TOADS!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: A co-op platformer about toxic toads! Complete the obstacle course alone or with friends, either working together or competing with one another. Create unique maps in the editor and share them with other players all over the world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese
